Name: I'm a sardine Keita
About the game: The game tells the story of Keita, the sardine, who rescues his friends when they are caught by other animals on the migration road. In the game, you will operate the sardine Keita, swim in the ocean, constantly collect gold, acquire weapons (different colors of fish bones), to defeat boobies, tuna, dolphins, sharks and whales, and finally rescue friends. Features: 1. You can swim in the ocean, swim up and down freely, move quickly to avoid other animals, and look for opportunities to defeat enemies. 2, You can collect other small animals in the ocean, gain gold and attack power. 3. You need to balance buoyancy and movement, maintain the ability to move quickly, and always be alert, because the sea is full of dangers. 4. The game has automatic saving function, gold coins will be saved automatically when they reach 100. Thank you for your attention and hope for your support! • And we really want you to support the other games of African boy Keita Studio!
Developers: African Boy Keita Studio,非洲小男孩凯塔工作室
